amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Revenue; certify maximum levy.
amendatorysection.para: The maximum levy for each community college area shall be certified by the Department of Revenue annually and shall equal one hundred twenty percent of the local effort rate calculated pursuant to section 85-2224 plus amounts allowed pursuant to subsection (2) of section 85-1517.
